### We are La Joya...

Mayor Isidro Casanova was born and raised in the city of La Joya, as a previous Police Chief, he stands firm against corruption and is determined to make a great change in the community. His short time in office has proven his great efforts along with the City Councils help to make La Joya succeed in all of its capabilities.

![](https://www.cityoflajoya.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/01/Mayor-Isidro-Casanova-736x1024.png)

### City Council Members

Our City Council is an essential part of The City of La Joya, these elected officials represent our communities interests and they hold significant decision making in matters such as financial and strategic planning, community growth, infrastructure projects, amongst other things. The Council is comprised of 5 members: 4 councilmembers at large, and the sitting Mayor.  Our City Manager is Leonardo Olivares (twitter: @LeoOlivaresEsq).
